title: SOLD: 1887 N693 Kalamazoo Bats - Boston BBC "Card" w/King Kelly & Charles Radbourn
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1887 N693 Kalamazoo Bats - Boston BBC "Card" w/King Kelly & Charles Radbourn
posts.post_content:
Good Afternoon, Collectors:

Up for sale today is approximately one-half of the team photo picturing the 1887 Boston Baseball Club with both key Hall of Famers, King Kelly (front row, center) & Charles Radbourn (back row, right) included. This piece originates from the N693 Kalamazoo Bats team card issue and is extremely rare with untrimmed copies of this card having sold for $20K+. This piece appears to have been attached to a scrapbook at one time as evidenced by the colorful backing. Despite the condition issues, when do you get a chance to pick up an affordable original photo picturing 2 19th Century HOF'ers? 

Please review scans of the front and back for condition details. Sale price on this item is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]

Phil, that is very interesting and I'm sure well worth your asking price.

Would you take 1/400th of a silk umbrella?
Sorry, Scott, no trade on this one, cash only........
